guideline.rule: Astro + React Integration: Use Astro's client directives, never dynamic imports
guideline.enforcement: Import React components in Astro frontmatter, use client:load/idle/visible for hydration
guideline.description: React components must be imported at build-time in Astro frontmatter (between ---), not dynamically in browser scripts. Always use explicit React imports in TSX files.

guideline.enforcement: Icon components must use 'client:load' and import from './Icon.tsx'
guideline.description: All icons should use the standard Phosphor icon library. Icon components must be client components with 'client:load' directive, not complex server+client mounting.

guideline.rule: Never use type 'any' - always use precise types
All email links must use erikk@shupp.dev
Use shared CSS libraries for calculator tools
